item.title: 3 Months of Code?
item.description: I stumbled upon Hacker School today. It really sounds like a neat idea, and I’m sure that it has helped some of the people that had the chance to go there. But it got me thinking … what if I had 3 months to work on whatever code I wanted to? What am I truly passionate about? If I had 3 months to code anything I wanted what would that be?
